entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 7:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
